content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ get ready to stay warm and fashionable this season with our incredible autumn wheat crochet sweater want the autumn wheat collection link below our crochet pattern includes a video tutorial making it super easy to follow along plus it s available in sizes xs-5x so everyone can enjoy the coziness join our vibrant community of crochet lovers and embark on this exciting crochet-along journey don t let this chance slip away to create stunning pieces for the chilly months ahead the best part every sweater is crocheted flat meaning it s perfect for beginners get cozy and stylish with us today ✨ what size can i make this sweater ✨ ✔️ stylish adult sweater - 9 sizes xs - 5x this is a cuff-to-cuff sweater crocheted flat we will start with making the ribbing for one cuff work the sleeve and increase then crochet the first section of the body the front & back sections to make room for the neck the second part of the body then the second sleeve while decreasing and then the final cuff this only needs two seams to become a sweater ✨ extra support & tips ✨ ✔️ video tutorials linked on youtube ✔️ join a community of crocheters ✔️ sweater schematic ✔️ diagram to guide you through each section ✨ what you will need to make this sweater ✨ yarn wecrochet upcycle worsted 1 - 33% alpaca 34% wool 33% acrylic 219yds/100g colorway shown sage weight 4 worsted yarn quantities 1150 1190 1250 1400 1500 1700 1900 2150 2375 yds 6 6 6 7 7 8 9 10 11 balls yarn substitutions listed in pattern notions scissors 2 yarn needle 3 removable stitch marker 4 crochet hook h 5 omm crochet hook 5 ✨ hey i m briana k ✨ join the autumn inspired crochet along for a cozy crochet experience we ll be creating beautiful wearables together in the briana k community collection i ve designed this collection to be fun and easy with only 1-2 seams required you ll love the pretty aesthetic and perfect fit of these approachable pieces make them for yourself or as gifts i ve enjoyed creating items to match my nephew this season get ready to learn new crochet techniques and build a wardrobe full of warmth and style join me and let s crochet together for the entire collection visit https //brianakdesigns etsy com/listing/1606279143 6 -
